welcome_message_body: "Welcome to vibrant Bangkok, known for its bustling street markets, rich history, and delicious street food. Take in the city's charm and explore its many wonders. Enjoy your stay!"

restaurants.name: Ama Art & Eatery
restaurants.description: Ama Art & Eatery is a thai restaurant located in พระนคร.
restaurants.address: 270, 272 Maha Rat Rd, พระนคร, กรุงเทพมหานคร 10200

restaurants.name: Mont Nom Sod (มนต์นมสด)
restaurants.description: Mont Nom Sod (มนต์นมสด) is a bakery located in พระนคร.
restaurants.address: 160/1-3 Dinso Rd (near Bangkok City Hall), พระนคร, กรุงเทพมหานคร 10200

restaurants.name: Mit Ko Yuan (มิตรโกหย่วน)
restaurants.description: Mit Ko Yuan (มิตรโกหย่วน) is a thai restaurant located in พระนคร.
restaurants.address: 186 Dinso Rd, พระนคร, กรุงเทพมหานคร 10200

restaurants.name: Home Café Tha Tien (โฮม คาเฟ่ ท่าเตียน)
restaurants.description: Home Café Tha Tien (โฮม คาเฟ่ ท่าเตียน) is a café located in พระนคร.
restaurants.address: 10 Soi Tha Tien, พระนคร, กรุงเทพมหานคร 10200

restaurants.name: A Pink Rabbit + Bob
restaurants.description: A Pink Rabbit + Bob is a café located in พระนคร.
restaurants.address: 378 Maha Rat Rd, พระนคร, กรุงเทพมหานคร 10200

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Don Muang Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Don Muang Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited speed and connectivity.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Main international terminal with a variety of shops and restaurants.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Domestic terminal with a smaller selection of shops and restaurants.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Newest terminal with modern facilities and a wide range of international and domestic flights.

wifi.note: Limited to 2 hours per device per day.
